text: Va [hamcunon] guft: «Ej pisaronam, [ʙaroi on ki calʙi tavaccuh nakuned] az jak dar vorid nasaved, ʙalki az darhoi muxtalif doxil saved va [alʙatta, ʙo in suporis] nametavonam cize az [qazo va qadari] Allohro az sumo dur kunam. Hukm cuz ʙaroi Alloh taolo nest. Bar U tavakkal kardam va tavakkalkunandagon ʙojad ʙar U tavakkal kunand
